palindrome.description: Palindrome number is a number that is the same when read forwards and backwards.

mersenne.description: Mersenne number is a number that is one less than a power of two.

harshad.description: Harshad number is a positive integer that is divisible by the sum of its digits.

factorial.error: Number is too big to calculate factorial

perfect.description: Perfect number is a positive integer that is equal to the sum of its factors except for the number itself.

prime.description: Prime number is a number greater than 1 that has exactly two distinct factors: 1 and itself.

fibonacci.description: Fibonacci Sequence is a sequence of numbers, starting with zero and one, is a steadily increasing series where each number is equal to the sum of the preceding two numbers.

triangular.description: Triangular Sequence is a sequence of numbers that can be represented in the form of an equilateral triangle when arranged in a series.

square.description: Square Sequence is a sequence of numbers where each term is the square of the corresponding number on the number line.
